entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: The person being referred to as 'You-Know-Who' is not explicitly mentioned in the text, but it is likely referring to Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: bulgarian wizard
entities.description: A Bulgarian wizard who recognizes Harry's scar and reacts excitedly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Rufus Fudge, the Minister of Magic.

entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch, a wizard who is needed for translating languages.

entities.name: house-elf
entities.description: A house-elf who is saving Harry a seat.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy, a wizard and the father of Draco.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy, a student at Hogwarts and the son of Lucius.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Arthur Weasley, a wizard and the father of Ron.

relationships.description: The Bulgarian wizard recognizes Harry's scar.
Barty Crouch is needed by Fudge for translating languages.
The house-elf saves Harry a seat.
Lucius Malfoy is the father of Draco.
Harry and Draco have been enemies since their first journey to Hogwarts.
Lucius Malfoy is seated near Mr. Weasley.
